name: iron_flesh
description: The enemy's skin is as tough as iron, reducing the impact of physical attacks.

name: nightmare_aura
description: A terrifying aura causes investigators to suffer mental strain when nearby.

name: shadow_step
description: The enemy can slip through the shadows, allowing quick repositioning without effort.

name: frenzied_strikes
description: Once the enemy lands a hit, their wild frenzy grants them an additional attack.

name: regeneration
description: The enemy heals rapidly, recovering health each round unless specific damage types are applied.

name: mind_shatter
description: The enemy's attacks not only hurt physically but also shatter the victim's mental stability.

name: bloodlust
description: When the enemy senses blood, it gains relentless energy, attacking even more viciously.

name: howling_scream
description: A piercing scream stuns investigators, leaving them vulnerable.

name: ancient_wrath
description: When the enemy is wounded, their rage intensifies, increasing their damage output.
